title: Installing just SkiaSharp in a WASM project still requires the Blazor package
body:
**Description**

When running SkiaSharp.Skottie in blazor webassembly app I get following error:
```
missing function: skottie_animation_make_from_stream
```

**Expected Behavior**

No error when running SkiaSharp.Skottie in blazor webassembly

**Actual Behavior**

Error when running SkiaSharp.Skottie in blazor webassembly

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.1-preview.63
- Last known good version:  -
- IDE: Rider
- Platform Target Frameworks:net6.0
  - Windows Classic:  Windows 10
